metadata.filename: Globally Multimodal Problem Optimization Via an Estimation of Distribution Algorithm Based on Unsupervised Learning of Bayesian Networks.md
metadata.title: Globally Multimodal Problem Optimization Via an Estimation of Distribution Algorithm Based on Unsupervised Learning of Bayesian Networks

tables.table_title: Effectiveness of the UMDA, the EBNA and the UEBNA for the 12 symmetrical optimization problems in the evaluation. All the values are given in terms of average and standard deviation over 10 independent runs.

Efficiency of the UMDA, the EBNA and the UEBNA for the 12 symmetrical optimization problems in the evaluation. All the values are given in terms of average and standard deviation over 10 independent runs.
